Summary: 2 fireball type obects over Fullerton-Placentia-Yorba Linda
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Fullerton
There was one other sighting in Fullerton on or around January 26th 2008
divs: sighting detailslast nite at 6pm we were travelling west on the 91fwy. my wife said "what the hell are those" and i looked and saw a small plane and two bright lights. at first i thought they were passenger jets lining up for lax. but they dropped sharply down so i pulled over at the st college exit to watch these ufos looked like fireballs with firetrails. one extinguished itself but the other one kept on. there was a helicopter circling (could have been a small plane) these ufos. the one that disappeared, reappeared. they then moved sideways, stopped, hovered and then moved sideways again. then after about 90 seconds they disappeared. the small plane\helicopter then flew overhead towards costa mesa\newport beach direction. it was surreal
